biotools.summary: The API for retrieving BacDive data in machine-readable JSON format. BacDive is the Bacterial Diversity Database and provides strain-linked information about bacterial and archaeal biodiversity. The API offers several possibilities to query detailed strain information.

bioschemas.name: BacDive API
